title: Update Google Ads tracking tag to new conversion ID

quotes:
<!-- Google tag (gtag.js) -->
<script async src="https://www.googletagmanager.com/gtag/js?id=AW-17969512168">
</script>
<script>
  window.dataLayer = window.dataLayer || [];
  function gtag(){dataLayer.push(arguments);}
  gtag('js', new Date());

  gtag('config', 'AW-17969512168');
</script>
This is Google ad tag ad this where needed

acceptanceCriteria: The Google Ads tracking tag in frontend/index.html uses conversion ID AW-17969512168
The gtag.js script loads asynchronously from the updated URL
The gtag config call references AW-17969512168
The script remains in the <head> section before </head>
No other Google Ads tracking codes remain in the HTML

constraints: Do not modify frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.tsx, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/main.tsx, or frontend/src/components/ui
nonGoals: Adding additional tracking or analytics code beyond the specified Google Ads tag
Modifying conversion tracking events or custom parameters
Adding Google Tag Manager or other Google marketing tools
